Starting Anew
Posted: May 18, 2018
While going over what I need to do in life after leaving college, I realized that I wasn’t happy with the content of my website. So I changed it. The new design is simplistic, and features the posts at the forefront. I’ll be utilizing it more now, and some of...

While going over what I need to do in life after leaving college, I realized that I wasn’t happy with the content of my website. So I changed it. The new design is simplistic, and features the posts at the forefront. I’ll be utilizing it more now, and some of the old posts might resurface. But it’ll be interesting to see how it goes.
